name: Star Sparrow
description:
Star Sparrow is 3D Space Arcade game, the main task is to achieve the highest score and don't get hit by meteorites. There are also spaceships with abilities such as shooting,  shield or dash. You can also join the online leaderboard with your highest score or complete all achievements to get a reward. 

Star Sparrow has 5 game modes, including playground, where you can set your own rules.

21 unlockable spaceships
